author: Heather Haddon
title: Blue Apron Sells Meal Kits at Costco
text:
Blue Apron Holdings Inc. said it has started selling meal kits at Costco Wholesale Corp. stores as the delivery company fights rising competition and operational challenges.
Blue Apron was one of the first companies to deliver meal kits for people to assemble at home. Now there are dozens, targeting niche groups from vegans to bacon lovers. Berlin-based HelloFresh S.E. said it had 900,000 U.S. customers in March, while Blue Apron counted 786,000 as of the end of March.
